com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.stats
Class StatQuad

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.scene.Spatial
      com.jme.scene.Geometry
          com.jme.scene.TriMesh
              com.jme.scene.shape.Quad
                  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.stats.StatQuad
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, Serializable
public class StatQuad
extends com.jme.scene.shape.Quad

A simple class extending Quad that turns off statistics collecting while it draws, preventing it from bleeding into the stats information.

Author:
Joshua Slack
See Also:
Serialized Form
